title: COVID 'It's Going to Disappear' Disinformation
summary: Trump repeatedly downplayed COVID-19, claiming 'It's going to disappear. One day—it's like a miracle—it will disappear' and promoted unproven hydroxychloroquine, contributing to public health crisis.
keyFacts: February 2020: 'It's going to disappear. One day—it's like a miracle—it will disappear'
Repeatedly promoted unproven hydroxychloroquine despite lack of evidence
Downplayed severity of pandemic even as cases surged
Contradicted his own health officials and scientists
Over 1 million Americans died from COVID-19
Experts say earlier action and consistent messaging could have saved lives
Pattern of prioritizing political optics over public health
